attributes.background: Introduced Legislation to allow students to take "Mental Health days" as they would sick days in an attempt to respond to a mental health crisis.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Sick days can already be used for mental health. We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
